data.content: HANDOFF: Unit test coverage boosted from 44.92% to 75.25% statements. PR #23 merged to main (squash commit f41c7fe). 5 new test files added: bd.test.ts (53 tests), terminal-store-extended.test.ts (29 tests), wave-slugs-extended.test.ts (36 tests), bead-columns-helpers.test.ts (12 tests), utils.test.ts (5 tests). Total: 257 tests, all passing. No source files modified. Codex review APPROVED. Bead left open for verification handoff.
